pin-up.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a picture of an attractive person, often not wearing many clothes, that is put up on a wall to be looked at and admired
pin-up.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a pin-up of her favourite boy band
pin-up.translation[0].definitions[1].def: someone who appears in pin-up pictures or who is considered attractive by a particular group of people
pin-up.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He’s becoming the thinking woman’s pin-up.
